summary: A dark comedy about one man's overreaction! Roma's (Anthony Michael Hall) perfect life unravels when his foreman goes missing and he chooses to fire the wrong guy.
cast: Anthony Michael Hall|Chris Penn|Jamie Harrold|Tony Danza|Frank Whaley|Federico Castelluccio|Elisabeth Röhm|Leo Burmester|Lily Rabe|Steve Cirbus|Kent King|Clark Middleton|Paul Borghese|David Bunce|Michael Curry|Jim Dippolito|Donna Frank|Gary Kohn|Jessica Korotkin|Lara Kulpa|Krista Laraine|Evan Leone|Daniel B. Martin|Jon McAllister|Isaac Orlando|Frank Pickus|Zoë Quinn|Jacinto Taras Riddick|Janelle Anne Robinson|Michalina Scorzelli|Nicole Signore|Steve Stanulis|Saul Stein|Art Swenson|Yury Tsykun|Duke Valenti|Eric VanArsdale|Michael Ciesla|April Crisafulli|Marque DeWinter|Frederic Heringes
title: Aftermath
